attributes.comment:
My husband and I are adopting internationally. This process is extremely
expensive, not the least because of forms like the I600-A, which cost several
hundred dollars. And now, because of increased waiting times for the adoption
process, the form will expire before we will even be able to use it to adopt our
child! It is unfair enough for us to have to refile in order to do what we
filed for in the first place; raising the fees is unconscionable. The form
should have a longer time frame; and the fees should be kept where they are, or
better yet, waived for those who have to now reapply.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Bonnie S. Lundin-Scheer
